item.description: Since playing the "pilot" on Limit Break Theater of the lolClipshow, we got many requests for a fully produced Limit Break Theater episode. So, here it is! The very first fully produced and finished Limit Break Theater episode "Sunny Days in San d'Oria". Join the LBR crew as they get ready to help Juxtaposition with a quest to defeat a dragon. Sound effects and music by Square-Enix. Written by Kallo. Produced and Directed by Aniero.

item.title: 1 Year Anniversary part 2: The Best Defense
item.description: Limit Break Radio continues it's 1 year anniversary celebration with the second half of the 2 part anniversary special. In this episode Cravion from the Odin server joins us to talk about Paladin, we also take a look at the recently released Pit and Pankration and this years Final Fantasy XI FanFest...also we announce some major staff changes, emails, AotW, Voices of Vana'diel. Juxta fails and fails some more and we say goodbye to one of our own.

item.title: 1 Year Anniversary part 1: Crap! Oh! Pwned! (aka CoPs)
item.description: Limit Break Radio celebrates it's first year in Final Fantasy XI podcasting with a massive two part episode! The first episode focuses on the Chains of Promathia missions, where we talk to the Pandemonium server's Tokash about various strategies for the major battles of the CoP missions. Also, Juxta makes a mess and Voices of Vana'diel. Part 2 will be coming soon....

item.title: Limit Breaking News 4 - The August 2007 Update
item.description: In the Limit Breaking News segment we take a look at the details of the August 2007 update. Krogenar comes back to talk about his recent work with The Flock linkshell of the Quetzalcoatl server and share his thoughts on the adjustments made to BST.

item.title: Not-so-lolDragoon
item.description: In this episode we talk to level 75 Dragoon and Samurai Twcblaze from the Leviathan Server about, you guessed it, Dragoon! Look! No lol! We also premier a brand new Final Fantasy XI remix by MarcstaR, called the Bard's Song which is available to download at www.limitbreakradio.com/listen.html. Plus a very special Adventurer of the Week, Voices of Vana'deil and more!

item.title: Limit Breaking News 3 - E3 2007 Wrap Up
item.description: Our convention correspondent Maxx-V joins us again to review all the new Wings of the Goddess information that was released at E3 2007. We examine three notable interviews that happened with the Final Fantasy XI big shots Koichi Ogawa, Hiromichi Tanaka, Sage Sundi, and Yasu Kurosawa. Lots of new information was released through these interviews including the announcement of new jobs as well as the 2007 Final Fantasy XI Fan-Fest!

item.title: Dice and Guns
item.description: We talk this week to Aniero's close and longtime friend Foobar (a.k.a. Omgwtfbbqkitten) from the Titan server about Corsair. This is a very different show for us, we were down two guests, Argetlam and Sayl weren't able to join us, but our old friend Tigrefury joins us again to lend us his expertise about Corsair. We also read your e-mails, Kallo gives his Adventurer of the Week and we premier our new Voices of Vana'diel segment.

item.title: Limit Breaking News 2 - The June 2007 Update
item.description: On June 05'th 2007 Final Fantasy XI was given a major version update, this Limit Breaking News is devoted to covering the finer points of that update. We're joined by the famous Ganiman of FFXIclopedia to catch up with him and discuss the new additions to the world of Vana'diel

item.title: lolClipshow
item.description: This is the most ridiculous episode that we've ever had. Aniero takes you through some of the material that was never meant to go over the air. This show is totally goofy and a little lacking on the information side, but we hope that you all will enjoy it anyway.

item.title: Limit Breaking News 1 - Wings of the Goddess
item.description: In this segment we discuss the new "Wings of the Goddess" expansion and our resident artist Maxx-V joins us from Tokyo, Japan where she's spent the last several days at the Square-Enix Party 2007 to discuss the expansion, the party and the june update.

item.title: My Best Friend Carby
item.description: In this episode we talk to Tigerfury of Pheonix, a former Summoner, but still an expert on the job. We talk Summoner, Avatars, the June Update and introduce a brand new segment. Also no Juxta FTW!

item.title: Hadouken!!!
item.description: This week we discuss Monk with Fenrir native Priestsan for the majority of the show, we also discuss the new chocobo racing, read your e-mails and a very special 21 Weapon Skill salute to Wozza. /cry

item.title: Cloak and Dagger
item.description: Sleekmotorwurkz joins us form the Lakshmi server to discuss one of his three jobs at level 75, Thief...we also take a second look at the march update, taking a closer look at the Nyzul Isle Assault, the force pop NM changes and more, plus your e-mails and AoTW

item.title: GMs > Puppies
item.description: Ganiman and Rickshaw of the Pheonix server and FFXIclopedia join us this week for a slightly shorter show. We talk about Gani and Ricks recent trip out to the Square-Enix headquarters in California as a part of the Final Fantasy XI Premier Site Summit, and we also talk about the update....and eating puppies....yeah...

item.title: Sea. (aka We couldn't come up with a title)
item.description: Kujata native Erecant lends us his expertise on the hardest endgame zone in Final Fantasy XI to date, Sea. We take an in depth look at Sea gods including the infamous Absolute Virtue. We also preview the March update and AotW.

item.title: In The Shadows...
item.description: This week we have another Odinite, Souel, on the show. We discuss one of the most popular jobs in the game, Ninja, as well as that oh-so-awesome abjuration gear. E-mails, a very special AoTW and Juxta...oh boy.

item.title: Master of Disaster
item.description: Jensen, a lvl75 SAM, joins us this week after his call was lost from Limit Break Radio's Spectacular Annual Platinum Extravaganza Edition Call-in Bonanza Special vol 1. We talk about Samurai and....drum roll please.....Salvage!! Emails and AoTW. Enjoy!

item.title: Limit Break Radio's Spectacular Annual Platinum Extravaganza Edition Call-in Bonanza Special vol 1
item.description: A two hour call-in special where Aniero and Kallo take calls from the Final Fantasy XI community and discuss whatever they want to. 17 calls in all, with a wide array of topics from Monk to resons to kick a party member to real life events, it's all covered here folks!

item.title: Bullseye!
item.description: Lahriel, a lvl 75 Blue Mage, Ranger and Bard, talks with us about Ranger and rank missions. We also discuss more of the upcoming update, read your emails and announce Limit Break Radio's Spectacular Annual Platinum Extravaganza Edition Call-in Bonanza Special Vol. 1!!

item.title: Running With Scissors
item.description: Elmer the Pointy of the Gilgamesh server joins us to discuss one of his 4 level 75 jobs, Puppetmaster. That's right...lolPUP. We also discuss the upcoming update, Arget shows his soft side and Adventurer of the Week returns!

item.title: The Beast!
item.description: Krogenar from the all mighty Lord of the Beasts Linkshell on the Shiva server joins us to talk about all things Beastmaster. We answer more emails and very special Adventurer of the Week.

item.title: The Quest Master
item.description: Quest woman Rosalie joins us from the Seraph server to talk about....quests! We also cover the basics of Sky and Wally get's a little out of hand.

item.title: The Rusty Paladin
item.description: Flipperfeet joins us from the Hades server and discusses Bard. We give our thoughts on the new update, talk about the dreaded Promyvions, and create horribly filthy jokes about Paladins.

item.title: Swing and a Miss
item.description: A very diffrent episode this week, Gyudva joins us from the Fairy server, Gamer joins us again filling in for Sayl, we talk lots of limbus, we read your emails and our Adventurer of the Week.

item.title: Update-tastic
item.description: Packed full of udate news and speculation. Ganiman joins us from the Pheonix server, he also discusses his site FFXIclopedia, we discuss the upcoming job adjustments, give a Vanafest '06 wrap-up, Aniero drools over the new Samurai job abilities, plus your emails and more!!

item.title: Not Just Boys Fun
item.description: Cosiala, our first female guest, joins us from Shiva, we discuss lolDragoon, we talk about the new video from Tokyo Game Show, and Kallo talks about treasure hunting. We also announce the winner of our Evisceration contest, read your emails, and we all get burned!

item.title: PWNED!
item.description: Gordor of Odin joins us, Kallo get a much needed ego check, we discuss Black Mage and Red Mage, Dynamis and Maat fights, we announce the first adventurer of the week and read your e-mails...other announcements are made...send Arget hate mail...that's about it

item.title: The Gamer Episode
item.description: Gamer joins us from the server Pandemonium, we discuss Paladin stratagies, crafting, fame quests, Garrison, and etiquette. We read your emails and indroduce our "Adventurer of the Week" program.

item.title: A Milestone
item.description: This is a big episode for Limit Break Radio. We have our first guest, Spazz, we discuss FFXI's PvP: ballista and brenner, Blue Mage pros and cons, RDM vs. BRD vs. COR, Assault, plus we announce Limit Break Radio's very first contest!!

item.title: Episode 2...ftw?
item.description: This week we discuss chocobo raising, our favorite memories from FFXI, really great players, besieged, signet/sanction and much more!

item.title: Cutting the Ribbon
item.description: The very first show from Limit Break Radio. Aniero, Kallo, Argetlam and Sayl discuss their characters, share their worst mistell stories and have in depth discussions about hate management and the new meritable abilities.
